title: Software Engineer
description: General software engineering interview covering algorithms, data structures, and system design
questionsPool: Tell me about yourself and your experience with software development
Explain the difference between a stack and a queue
How would you design a URL shortening service like bit.ly?
What is your experience with version control systems?
Explain the concept of Big O notation
How do you approach debugging a complex issue?
What are design patterns you frequently use?

title: Frontend Developer
description: Frontend development interview focusing on React, JavaScript, and web technologies
questionsPool: What is your experience with React and modern frontend frameworks?
Explain the virtual DOM and how React uses it
How do you manage state in a large React application?
What are React hooks and how do they work?
How would you optimize the performance of a web application?
Explain the difference between CSS Grid and Flexbox
How do you ensure web accessibility in your applications?

title: Backend Developer
description: Backend development interview covering APIs, databases, and server-side technologies
questionsPool: What is your experience with backend development?
Explain RESTful API design principles
How would you design a database schema for a social media platform?
What is the difference between SQL and NoSQL databases?
How do you handle authentication and authorization?
Explain caching strategies and when to use them
How would you scale a backend service to handle millions of users?

title: Data Scientist
description: Data science interview covering machine learning, statistics, and data analysis
questionsPool: Tell me about your experience with machine learning
Explain the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning
How would you handle missing data in a dataset?
What is overfitting and how do you prevent it?
Explain the bias-variance tradeoff
How do you evaluate the performance of a machine learning model?
Describe a data science project you've worked on

title: DevOps Engineer
description: DevOps interview covering CI/CD, infrastructure, and automation
questionsPool: What is your experience with DevOps practices?
Explain the concept of Infrastructure as Code
How would you set up a CI/CD pipeline?
What is containerization and why is it important?
Explain the difference between Docker and Kubernetes
How do you monitor and troubleshoot production systems?
What is your experience with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure?
